name: Superfruit Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser with Vitamin C + Papaya
about: What it is:u00a0A gentle exfoliating cleanser with fruit enzymes + acids that brightens and boosts cellular skin renewal, leaving skin smooth, soft + radiant...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Pores, and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Gel..Highlighted Ingredients:- AHA and BHA Complex (Salicylic, Glycolic, Lactic, and Phytic Acids): Gently supports cellular turnover..- Ginger Root and Papaya: Visibly brighten skin and improve radiance..- Vitamin Cg and Yerba Mate: Fight free-radical damage and brighten skinu2019s appearance...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: A treatment gel cleanser that gently exfoliates + brightens without disrupting skin's moisture barrier. Formulated to even tone + texture, it helps get rid of rough skin while maintaining skin's hydration...Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -AHA and BHA Complex (Salicylic, Glycolic, Lactic, and Phytic Acids): Gently supports cellular turnover..-Ginger Root and Papaya: Visibly brighten skin and improve radiance..-Vitamin Cg and Yerba Mate: Fight free-radical damage and brighten skinu2019s appearance....2073012 20 INGREDIENTS: AQUA/WATER/EAU, GLYCERIN, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, AMMONIUM POLYACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE, GLYCOLIC ACID, SODIUM METHYL COCOYL TAURATE, NIACINAMIDE, LACTIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, CARICA PAPAYA FRUIT EXTRACT/PAPAYA FRUIT EXTRACT, ILEX PARAGUARIENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, PASSIFLORA EDULISFRUIT JUICE, ZINGIBER OFFICINALE ROOT EXTRACT/GINGER ROOT EXTRACT, ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE, CAFFEINE, CAPRYLOYL SALICYLIC ACID, PHYTIC ACID, TOCOPHEROL, BISABOLOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CITRIC ACID, COCONUT ACID, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS SEED OIL/SUNFLOWER SEED OIL, SODIUM CHLORIDE, TRIDECETH-9, LIMONENE, LINALOOL, CI 40800/ BETA-CAROTENE, CHLORPHENESIN, PHENOXYETHANOL, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SALICYLIC ACID, SODIUM BENZOATE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE. FIL N70046200/1...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Massage onto wet skin for at least 30 seconds..-Rinse thoroughly..-Use as a treatment at least 3x a week to complement your daily Superfood Cleanser routine or depending on your current skincare routine Superfruit Cleanser can be used 2x a day for optimal results..Recycling Instructions:.-Take off the cap and dispose into the proper container; check your local recycling authority's guidelines to make sure you use the correct one..-Wash glass jar thoroughly in hot, soapy water..-Rinse, then dry. If you skip this step, containers may contaminate other materials, like paper, in a mixed-waste stream..-Place clean, dry glass jar in your recycling bin.

reviews.review_title: Leaves skin feeling clean, without stripping!

However, using this cleanser, it literally burned the second I put it on my skin, especially on spots where I have acne. I donu2019t have sensitive skin, so if my skin reacted like this, I can only imagine on someone who has sensitive skin. I donu2019t recommend this cleanser. I'm going to stick to their other cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product for an honest review: and honestly after 2 months I can say I since this is the only product I changed in my simple routine, then I love it! The smell is pleasant but more importantly it gives results! I have bigger pores and this gel-like foaming cleanser minimizes their appearance. I also get spots which are fading. My skin still gets breakouts but only once since I started this! And I no longer have to spend a fortune on Vitamin C serum because it is in here! And in a beautiful glass bottle instead of plastic :-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face wash! It has a great consistency & lathers very well. It cleans off all my makeup with one wash & leaves my skin feeling great! I went to Europe for three weeks & sadly didnu2019t bring it with meu2026 well my skin was a disaster the entire time & my pores were a mess. In just a few washes once I got home, my skin was back to normal. That tells you how great this cleanser is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm the kind of skin that still gets those hormonal breakouts once a month still to this day in my early 30's I've tried just about everything. I used this twice a day for a month and I'm absolutely floored! My skin feels soft and not stripped like some over face washes I've used. It also doesn't leave me oily. I use a spf moisturizer and setting spray to compensate for the sun sensitivity and have had no issues. The papaya smells absolutely incredible and there's lots of product in the bottle. I only need about a half pump to lather my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of the cleanser. The texture felt great and made my skin clean and super soft.

reviews.review_title: I would purchase in the future
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received this for my honest review. I can say that If you are someone with sensitive skin this may not be something you can use every day or even multiple times a week, however, for me I was able to use this every other day and it made my skin look so refreshed, bright and smooth. Scent is pleasant and not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After a week of using this, I noticed something different about my skin. I didn't immediately tie it back to this product, but since this was the only thing that changed in my routine, I realized this had to be it. My face was glowing and looked a lot brighter. I've always struggled with dull and textured skin, but the vitamin C and lactic acid helped greatly. This will be one of my holy grail products from now on!

reviews.review_title: Begone rough skin and PMS acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I suffer from really bad PMS acne every month and this stuff helps to reduce it a ton. Instead of a face full of zits, I only have two zits now. Not to mention it makes my skin feel very smooth. Just remember to use sunscreen in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First off, this is a product that I purchased myself.  Have been using for approximately 2 weeks.  I am 47 years old and have VERY combination skin.  I regularly use anti-aging products like retinol at night, vitamin C serum in am, etc.  I have milia around my eyes from rich eye cream that I couldn't get rid of with various toners. Using this cleanser for a small amount of time in the morning has gotten rid of those tiny milia bumps. Also, my pores are actually appearing smaller.  I don't have sensitive skin at all, but it does dry out with some  products and was super dry using the green YTTP cleanser.  The smell is light and refreshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do not find that I Iu2019m sensitive skin, but I like the chemical exfoliation that this comes with rather than a physical exfoliation. It smells great made my skin feel super soft. I had no issues with it. Great addition to my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from BzzAgent and I wish I could say that it was great, but sadly it was nothing but for me. My skin broke out worse, and brought on eczema spread across my upper lip into my nostrils. I felt that it did exfoliate, which was about the best part of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A few different things with this. It says to use twice daily, but because of the AHAu2019s, you have to be cautious with sun exposure after use. Then, if you use retinol in your routine at night, you shouldnu2019t be using this product in combination with the retinol as use of retinol with AHAu2019s and BHAu2019s can damage your skin barrier. Because I wasnu2019t sure how to fit this in with my current routine, I stopped my normal routine to give this a shot for a month. Honestly, it really dried out my skin. I donu2019t have super sensitive skin but this really killed me. It left dry patches all over my face that I worked so hard to repair with my normal routine. I would not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Youth To The People Superfruit Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser with Vitamin C + Papaya is so amazing cleanser. It smells citrusy and gingery. I use a small amount and cleanse my face for about 30 seconds with this product and rinse off. After using this product, skin feels softer and brighter, my dark spots are lighter. I will definitely be purchasing it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Whenever I see a product that says u201clactic acidu201d I get a little nervous because I have somewhat sensitive skin and donu2019t want anything to sting or be too drying.  This did NOT bother my skin at all! If you do have more sensitive skin, Iu2019d recommend maybe a couple times a week to start with. I did have a tiny bit of dryness, but nothing too crazy.  The reason why I gave this 4 stars is because it doesn't lather the way that I like. Itu2019s more of a gel and doesn't create a lot of bubbles. This is just a personal preference though. On one hand I am glad that this didnu2019t bother my skin, but I wish I saw for of an exfoliation. Maybe with longer use I will see a bigger change.  I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_title: Nice exfoliating cleanser to use with care.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try and review. It can be a great addition to a skincare routine as an enzyme/acidic exfoliator, but to be used with care as it can increase sun sensitivity.  Pros: exfoliating, brightening, smoothening.  Cons: the smell is strong and fruity. I have sensitive skin, so I definitely cannot use this as a daily cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleaners smells so good and has helped so much with reducing the appearance of my acne scars. I use it on my face and sometimes on my body as well. Iu2019m obsessed with it and will definitely be getting more

reviews.review_title: Great Product When Used With Care
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Youth To The People Superfruit Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser with Vitamin C + Papaya is a nice option if you're looking for a gentle exfoliator that brightens your skin. That said, it's definitely one to use with care. Since it has Vitamin C, I wouldnu2019t recommend using it in the morning because of the risk of photo sensitivity. Itu2019s better for your nighttime routine.  For those with sensitive skin, it might be a bit much. My skin felt tight after using it, and mineu2019s only slightly sensitive. The fragrance is pretty strong, which I usually donu2019t like in skincare, but since itu2019s from natural ingredients, I can deal with it.  A little goes a long way. Iu2019ve found the sweet spot is about half a pump, just once or twice a week. Any more, and it might leave your skin feeling dry. Used correctly, though, it really does leave the skin feeling smoother and looking more radiant. Just make sure to listen to your skin and adjust how often you use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this cleanser! Itu2019s one of the few that I have tried that actually work & donu2019t leave a greasy feeling. It even worked well on my preteen daughter. It has a nice smell & really leaves your skin feeling clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my face is very sensitive so itu2019s hard to find a gentle exfoliant. after trying to new papaya cleanser my skin felt so soft and plump afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After a few weeks of using this cleanser, I can confidently say Iu2019m hooked! Itu2019s gentle enough for daily use on my combination skin, which is essential because Iu2019m prone to over-exfoliating. The papaya and vitamin C work wonders together, and Iu2019ve seen a real difference in my skinu2019s brightness and clarity. My complexion is more even, and I have this healthy glow back.  The fact that it comes in a glass bottle is a bonus! I highly recommend giving it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Having tried various cleansers, the Papaya + Vitamin C Superfruit Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser stands out for its unique formulation and effectiveness. Compared to others, it provides a gentle exfoliation that leaves the skin feeling refreshed, but I did notice it was slightly drying, which limited my use to once a day instead of twice.  Benefits: This cleanser has a brightening effect, and I appreciated how it helped enhance my complexion over time. The papaya and vitamin C combination gives it a fresh scent and a natural feel, making it enjoyable to use.  Would I Buy It? Yes, I would consider repurchasing this product, especially for a once-daily routine.  Would I Recommend It? I would recommend this cleanser to friends and family, particularly those looking for a gentle exfoliant that promotes brightness in the skin. Just be aware of its drying properties, so it may not be suitable for very dry skin types. Overall, itu2019s a solid addition to any skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this new face wash. It has brightend my skin and also helped with the irritation I have. It smells good and is easy to wash off. No residue and not greasy.

I also feel this does a good job of brightening the skin, so it's best to apply sunscreen after using this. I am excited I got to try this cleanser.  Pros: gentle non-irritating smooths skin has a pump isn't rough on the skin great ingredients  Cons: can burn open wounds

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To be up front, I received this product from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. I have been using this cleanser at night every other day for the past three weeks and I really like how it works. It smells citrusy and gingery, which I find very pleasant. It doesn't burn or string, or cause sensitivity on my skin, and I have reacted to Vitamin C and heavy exfoliating products in the past. I think as a wash-off cleanser, it is gentler because it only has contact with my skin for ~30 seconds. I haven't noticed any incredibly transformative results, but it does leave my skin soft and maybe slightly more smooth feeling afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing! Instantly gives you a glow and your skin feels amazingly soft after use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, it has brightened my skin, my dark spots are lighter and it does not make my skin dry! I love it and canu2019t even say anything bad about the product or smell! Smells delicious! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the most effective cleansers I've used! I've used it a lot, and was surprised at how gentle it was despite having AHA, lactic acid , and vitamin C! I washed my face for 30 seconds as specified on the box, and didn't experience any stinging or burning. It had a pleasant citrus scent as well. After using it for almost a month, my skin looks smoother and my fine lines aren't as noticeable. Thanks, BzzAgent, for sending this complimentary cleanser!

reviews.review_title: Great smell & good for combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a couple of weeks, I have noticed that my face looks glowing, but I haven't noticed my sun spots fading or anything like that.  I do like that this is a gentle cleanser and doesn't irritate my skin. I do have sensitive and combination skin. I did start using this cleanser every other day, in case it over dried my skin, but I didn't experience anything like that.

reviews.review_title: A new favorite with quick results!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is going to become a staple in my skincare routine! Before trying this, I was a dedicated user of YTTP Superfood Cleanser and although that won't change, this Papaya + Vitamin C Cleanser will be a cleanser I plan to use consistently 2X a week indefinitely. For me personally, I think it may be a little too stripping to use every day but I had noticeably a difference in skin texture and lack of dullness after a few weeks of using it! I have combination/oily skin so if you had naturally dry skin I don't think you'd want to use this every day. I did receive this cleanser for free in exchange for my review, but I must say I will definitely be buying this in the future. YTTP is a company that is consistently on the top of their skincare game and always at a good price point for the fast results you see! 10/10 would recommend :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve recently added this to my skin care routine & so far I love how it feels on the skin. Iu2019m awaiting results but Iu2019m excited to continue to use !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash smells really good but I'm not a huge fan of heavily scented face products. I have sensitive, combination skin and it made the area around my mouth and nose feel a little sensitive immediately after use but it did make my skin look radiant and bright afterwards.

reviews.review_title: Glass bottle design is very beautiful and environm
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of PAPAYA VITAMIN C GINGER ROOT LACTIC ACID and have been using it for 2 weeks. The result is that my oily skin is clear and bright. The gel formula makes my skin soft and smooth and maintains moisture. I really like this product and will buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Instantly brightens my skin and creates a glow, even before post-cleanse products. Doesnu2019t overly lather and doesnu2019t run or spread too much. Also works great for cleansing mascara without leaving residue in the eyes & doesnu2019t burn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the papaya + vitamins c cleanser with my teenager, and we both loved it! After two weeks of use, our skin is glowing and healthier. The formula is gentle but also effective to remove impurities. We loved the packaging and the pleasant scent adds a nice touch. We've noticed fewer breakouts, smoother skin, and itu2019s perfect for both teen and adult skin. We are definitely adding this cleanser to our routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is extremely harsh for my sensitive, oily skin. I use a small amount and cleanse my face for about 30 seconds with this product and rinse off. What has been happening after using this cleanser is very strange - it actually accentuates my hyperpigmentation/dark spots. This is of course very frustrating because a gentle exfoliator should not have such an effect. I use this product extremely sparingly for this very reason.

reviews.review_title: Light, fresh scent and helpful with texture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This came in beautiful packaging! Since using this cleanser, Iu2019ve noticed an improvement with my skin texture. It also has a light, fresh scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary in exchange for my honest review. Iu2019ve been using this for a couple weeks, and havenu2019t noticed much in terms of the claims of brighter, smoother skin. It smells pleasantly of papaya, but does feel drying and stripping on my normal skin. My skin feels clean but thatu2019s the only thing that it seems to be doing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this YTP super fruit cleanser and I cannot describe how much I love this product! The packaging is top tier! Glass bottle, great for the environment and I will definitely be reusing when the product is gone. The smell is amazing. A very fruity, clean smell. And my skin. Oh my skin. The improvement is out of this world! I will definitely be purchasing.

reviews.review_title: FIVE STARS for me - 4 for those with dry skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free for my honest opinion. Initially I had mixed feelings about this cleanser. I have combination skin that is sensitive. Finding products that address my needs is difficult. When I first tried this face wash, it left my skin radiating, but also tight. It was a bit drying on the dry spots of my face. I was determined to make this product work for me because of the good ingredients it has. I am SO GLAD I stuck it out. I quickly learned that using this every day to exfoliate was a bit too much for my skin, but using it every other is GOLDEN!!!! My skin stays supple and moisturized, and this sloughs away all the flakes and dead skin leaving my complexion glowing and smooth. I absolutely LOVE IT! I gave only 4 stars because it may be over drying for someone with dry skin, but for mine- a total 5 stars!!!!!!!!!

reviews.review_title: Great new cleanser in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who hasn't always been a fan of Youth to the People products, I was genuinely surprised by how much I enjoyed using this cleanser. The papaya scent is refreshing and natural, without being overpowering, which makes the experience even more enjoyable. After just the first use, my skin felt incredibly soft, clean, and revitalized. What I appreciate most is that it thoroughly cleanses without leaving my skin feeling dry or stripped of moistureu2014something Iu2019ve struggled with in other cleansers. After using it consistently for a few weeks, Iu2019ve noticed a real improvement in my skinu2019s texture and overall appearance. Itu2019s now become a staple in my daily skincare routine, and I look forward to using it every day. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a gentle, effective cleanser with a pleasant scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this- I have normal skin. It cleaned my skin but frankly it was a little stripping and nothing special. Best for oily skin but honestly it was meh. I can't say I would recommend this because it doesn't stand up next to much better cleansers for much cheaper.

reviews.review_title: Try Before You Buy if You Can
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried Papaya + Vitamin C Superfruit Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser from Youth to the People.  The smell is a pleasant, what I assume is papaya, scent. I washed my face with the product as directed twice a day at first, but I already knew after the first use that twice a day would be too much.  The product leaves my skin clean and soft, but also tight, which I don't like, but that isn't a deal breaker for me. I followed up with my usual moisturizer. After the first day I only used the product once a day. After a few days, I noticed that I was waking up with dry, flaky skin on my cheeks and chin, so I cut back to every other day.  My skin is oily / combination.  I did not experience any redness or burning. My skin does look brighter and more even, but this didn't improve my texture, nor reduce the look of my large pores. I give this a 3.5 out of 5.

reviews.review_title: My sensitive, oily skin did NOT like this product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product. It smelled so good, but after 20 seconds of having it on my face, my skin started to burn and tingle. I immediately rinsed it off, and my face felt very tight and looked shiny. It feels like it completely stripped the moisture out of my skin. Now, my focus is on repairing my skin's moisture barrier. I'm so disappointed!!

reviews.review_title: I will definitely be getting a 2nd bottle!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this cleanser I noticed my skin looked more even and smoother. I had a significant improvement of texture! My skin is as close to u201cglass skinu201d as itu2019s ever been and I am so excited!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is very sensitive, however this cleanser is gentle and does not make my skin irritated or red. It washes off makeup well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been very happy with this product. It smells great and my super sensitive skin hasnu2019t had any negative reactions- so this really is a gentle formula. My only reason for four stars is the price. That said, I would definitely recommend this product to folks who are able to spend a little extra to support an ethical company.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this cleanser for free in exchange for my review and have been enjoying it so far! I have dry and sensitive skin and donu2019t find the actives to be irritating personally, but I do use retinols so my skin is used to active ingredients, which may be why I didnu2019t experience the irritation that others have mentioned. My skin felt clean and soft after using and definitely looked pretty glowy. Although itu2019s relatively gentle, I would stick to the directions and use it 3x a week rather than as a daily cleanser to avoid over-exfoliating. I also only use it at night because the lactic acid and vitamin c can make skin more sensitive to the sun, so Iu2019d recommend using a high spf sunscreen if used as a morning cleanser. I took one star off because it is pretty heavily fragranced which typically isnu2019t my favorite, but it seems like a lot of the fragrance is natural since added fragrance is the last ingredient. The smell isnu2019t bad and just smells like citrus, so just a personal preference! Overall, I think this is a nice way to exfoliate and cleanse at the same time if you want to reduce the amount of products in your routine. If youu2019re newer to active ingredients, I think this would also be a good way to introduce your skin to them. However, I would just be aware that your skin may need a week or two to adjust before you get the best resultsu2014just be sure to use a good moisturizer after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Superfruit Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser with Vitamin C + Papaya for a couple weeks now and I saw results from the first use. I noticed smoother, brighter skin right away. I wasn't sure if there would be any drying so I followed up with a light moisturizer and my skin looks fabulous! It is scented but gentle enough on my sensitive skin that it didn't cause a reaction. I would definitely buy this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super refreshing. I recommend this in the morning is super refreshing and you can have the sense of cleanliness after use. Reilly great papaya smell if you like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a few weeks, Iu2019m impressed with the results. This exfoliating cleanser strikes a great balance between deep cleaning and being gentle enough for regular use. The texture is not rough or extra gritty from natural exfoliants that effectively slough away dead skin cells without feeling too harsh or abrasive on my skin. After each wash, my face feels smooth, refreshed, and soft, without any tightness or drying. The scent is mild and refreshing, fruity but not overly sweet, and the formula doesnu2019t irritate or cause redness. Over time, Iu2019ve noticed my skin looks brighter, and the overall texture is much more even. Iu2019ve had fewer breakouts as well, likely due to the unclogging action of the exfoliants. Overall, this is a fantastic addition to any skincare routine, especially for those looking for a product that combines exfoliation with daily cleansing. It leaves your skin feeling clean, soft, and rejuvenated after every use. The glass bottle and cleanser color are also easy on the eyes! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: A must for exfoliating without drying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over the past few weeks, I have been loving the results! This gentle exfoliating cleanser is great for brightening and smoothing out my skin. My dark spots are appearing lighter. Using this on a daily basis has not dried out my skin or left it irritated. The cleanser has a great lather   and it smells really nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is super gentle on my skin. It effectively removes my makeup and impurities. It has a pleasant gel like texture and it smells absolutely wonderful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a couple weeks now, and I've been enjoying the results! I've noticed my skin is brighter/more glowy, more smooth, and soft. It also makes my skin feel very clean. There's a slight scent (doesn't bother me - just letting you know), and a couple times my skin did feel somewhat on the dry side - but after using a good moisturizer, everything was great. I do love that this comes in a (recyclable) glass container with a pump! I think this is a great cleanser that does what it claims to do!

reviews.review_title: Leaving my skin feeling smooth after use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin was very dried and I noticed a lot more dead skin around my cheeks area. After trying this cleanser I could feel my skin becoming solfter to the touch. It did leave a tingling feeling and causedy skin to become tight after I washed it off with water. Make sure you put moisturizer right after cleansing your face. I have high hopes for this cleanser!

reviews.review_title: Better for the Body than Face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, this cleanser has a powerful grapefruit smell. Iu2019m not the biggest fan of scented products, but it seems like the fragrance is derived from natural ingredients. Nonetheless, I am sensitive to fragrances, so I probably wonu2019t continue using this on my face.  It feels refreshing, but afterwards my skin feels tight and stings just a little. This is to be expected because of the AHA, but I prefer other chemical exfoliants like tretinoin, so twice daily use is overkill for my skin. I used it on my body for a week or so and was impressed with the improvement in texture.  I primarily use vitamin C in my skincare routine because of the pollution where I live. Iu2019m dubious of how effective a cleanser with vitamin C can be given that it is only on your skin briefly and then is washed off.  Overall, itu2019s not a bad product if you are starting out on your skincare journey. I will continue using it on my body, but I am not likely to purchase in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Bzzagent to review for free. First off I love this product. I have us YTTP before, but not this cleanser. This cleanser smelled so good, came in a beautiful glass bottle and was a thick consistency. It also has made my skin so clear, and so soft. Iu2019ve been using for some time and I have noticed acne scars fading as well. Itu2019s gentle and easy to use and to clean off, no residue on my skin. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Youth To The People Superfruit Cleanser has a refreshing, pleasant scent that enhances the cleansing experience. However, it tends to leave the skin feeling dry and a bit tight after use, which might not be ideal for those with sensitive or dry skin. Overall, it's a decent cleanser but may require follow-up with a good moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser nightly for around two weeks - I can see and feel a difference in my skin's texture.  I can also see a bit of fading in my face's  hyperpigmentation spots. This cleanser isn't cheap, but a small amount goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: It has become part of my routine.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Since I started using the product, my skin feels cleaner. And it smells wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Youth To The People Papaya + Vitamin C Superfruit Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser complimentary through Bzzagent in exchange for my honest review. This cleanser has a thicker consistency and feels like a gel mask on the face. I applied in circular motions to cover my entire face and thought this rinsed off easily with water. After rinsing, my skin felt soft, clean and not overly stripped. I did not notice this feeling sticky or leaving my skin dry. My face looked bright and had a nice glow. This does contain AHA and BHA so it is recommended to wear sunscreen afterwards, which I always do regardless. I even used this without removing my makeup first, and I believe it did a great job at taking it off and not leaving any residue behind. This has a pleasant tropical scent that seems natural to the ingredients, but fragrance is one of the last ingredients and this may bother someone. I also enjoy that this comes in a glass bottle with an easy to use pump, and looks great sitting on a countertop. Overall, I enjoyed this cleanser and would recommend it to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Since using this cleanser once a day for about three weeks now, Iu2019ve noticed my skin has become clearer, smoother, and more even. Iu2019m a lighter peach skin tone with combination skin. Iu2019ll be continuing to use Youth To The People products going forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed how this product applied to the skin. It was very creamy at application and emulsified very nicely. After rinsing it off, I did notice that my face had a very glowy appearance. But, after the dry down, my face was very tight. Unfortunately, I do have very dry skin and although this product claims to work on all skin types, it did not work for mine. I think it would work great for those with an oily skin type.  This product was sent to me in exchange for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this scrub. It is really gentle, yet really effective on my face. I noticed my skin feels cleaner and looks brighter. It smells amazing too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about this product but wow I could see the difference right away! I tried it on my mom and she loved it too! Iu2019ll be honest I wasnu2019t a fan of the green cleanser from them but this one I might actually buy again. If you havenu2019t use lactic acid before be warned it might sting a little so start slow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this cleanser for the past 4 weeks and have noticed a big difference in clarity and texture of my skin. It is gentle, yet effective in removing makeup and sunscreen. my skin feels so soft and is glowing afterward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser smells and feels amazing. I have combination skin with acne scars and this is so gentle on my skin. It doesnu2019t dry out my skin or make it feel oily. My skin looks brighter and clearer since I started using this face gel daily. It has smoothed some of my texture and I would definitely recommend this if you are looking for a gentle exfoliating cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan of the burning sensation after each use. I gave it a few tries but Iu2019ll be returning it. I doubt Iu2019ll purchase anything from this brand in the future

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is going to be my favorite cleanser from now on. Since the first time I used it I noticed a great difference on my skin pigmentation, the color of my sking is more uniform now. Also when I touch my skin feels way softer and healthy. I received this product in exchange of my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser!! I have dry sensitive skin and this is so perfect for me! It cleanses without drying my skin out and leaves me looking and feeling hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleaner is amazing. This performs a great job of removing any remaining makeup and leaves my skin feeling really clean. It smells delicious, like fresh papaya, and it does not affect my skin at all. This feels hydrating and clean without being overly stripping or drying on my combination skin. I recommend trying this!

This is my 3rd YTTP facial cleansing product I've tried and I really like it a lot! When I saw the title said it was exfoliating, I assumed it'd have a scrubby texture, but this is very silky smooth when I put it on and rub it onto my face. The scent is very distinct, fruity and smells refreshing. It's super easy to use with the pump handle, however, I don't quite need a full pump though. It makes my skin feel great right after use and all day long. I do have sensitive, combination oily and dry skin so it's hard to find products that work best for me, but everything I've tried so far from YTTP works great for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for a few weeks now. The packaging is fantastic. I love that it is in a glass bottle and the pump is easy to use in the shower. The smell of the product is fantastic. It wakes me up first thing in the morning when I wash my face but isn't overwhelming. This product worked great on my combination skin, however I do wish it was just a little bit more hydrating. I am interested to see how it does on my skin in the winter months. I will continue to use this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I used this product on both my face and back/chest/armpits for 1.5 weeks. I have sensitive, dry skin so it was too abrasive around my mouth and nose (hence the 4 stars). However, this was great to use on my body and armpits and was not irritating at all. I genuinely think it helped with the hyperpigmentation in my armpits. My fiance uses it on his face and really likes it and has no issues. There is a pleasant fruity scent too. If your skin is not super sensitive, and you are interesting in adding an exfoliating acid to your routine, this would be a great way to do it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product the last few weeks, I can honestly say that this product is gentle, smooth, and smells great! It doesnu2019t have those harsh beads in it even though it is an exfoliant. Will continue to use!
I love this product! Even the first wash made my skin very smooth and the exfoliation has been very gentle for my skin. 10/10 would stock up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Papaya + Vitamin C Superfruit Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser did a great job gently exfoliating my skin without over-drying or being too harsh. I love that it removed the dead skin and gave me a fresh feel after I used it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this cleanser. My skin feels so clean after using this and does a good job at getting any extra makeup off as well. It has a lovely fresh papaya scent to it and does not irritate my skin at all. I have combo skin and this helps my skin feel clean and hydrated without being too stripping or drying. I highly recommend giving this a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: sort of drying but my skin looks brighter and it hasn't been too harsh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product to try for free in exchange for my review.  I have been using this cleanser for about a week. I like the glass bottle that it comes in, and it makes my face feel very clean. It looks and feels like a luxury product. I have slightly sensitive skin, and if I leave it on my face too long, it burns a little. But, I'm careful with it, and I think the improvement in my skin after using it is worth it.

I was given this product in exchange for my honest review nd overall, I am quite pleased with it. The cleanser comes in a generously sized glass pump bottle, making dispensing the product very convenient.  The cleanser has a scent that isnu2019t my favorite, but itu2019s not overpowering or unpleasant. More importantly, it excels in its primary function: exfoliating and brightening the skin. After using it, I noticed a significant improvement in the texture of my skinu2014it felt much smoother and looked more radiant.  One downside I experienced was that my skin felt a bit dry after using the cleanser. However, this was easily remedied by following up with a good moisturizer, which I always do as part of my skincare routine.  I would say, if you donu2019t mind a slightly drying effect and can follow up with a good moisturizer, this cleanser is definitely worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for an honest review. This cleanser is gentle but still provides an effective cleanse. It exfoliates well, without irritation. I use this every morning and I noticed that my acne marks are starting to fade. I highly recommend if you have normal skin!

reviews.review_title: Best wake me up face wash
reviews.review_text: This is so nice and leaves your skin feeling soft and refreshed. I love this from the texture to the lather to the smell. I got this as a review but I was already going to buy it when it came out. I am so pleased with the opportunity to review it. I love the glow that I get from it. It's light and has a good foam. I love this product so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash! It somehow leaves my face squeaky-clean but not tight or dry feeling. My skin glows all day after I use this face wash. It smells so good like citrus and papaya. A little half-pump goes a long way, so I've had this bottle for about 2 weeks and have barely made a dent in the amount of product. It is important to let the product stay on your face for at least a minute so all the nutritious goodness really has time to soak in to your skin. Overall an excellent product that I would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This makes the Papaya + Vitamin C Superfruit Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser simply work wonders in any skincare routine. The content of vitamin C therein makes quite an outstanding improvement in brightness and clarity of the skin upon continued use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving his product. The packaging is glass and it smells fresh and clean like something you would find at a spa. I love that this product is a chemical exfoliate rather than a physical exfoliate. I will say to use with caution if you have sensitive skin or are using other exfoliating products. I use a retinol and I found that after the first few days using this with my retinol I was getting some dry patches. So I backed off and worked my way up to using every day. My skin also tends to react sensitively to new products so I built my skin up to this cleanser by using it once a day for the first two days instead of their recommended twice a day. I also stuck to a very simple skincare routine of using a makeup remover balm, this Papaya cleanser, and then a moisturizer (in my case the belif moisturizing balm) to see an unbiased effect of the cleanser.  My thoughts after a full week and two days of receiving the product-- I'm pretty impressed with how it evened out my skin and especially minimized my pores and blackheads. I'm ngl, the cleanser burned a little bit on the first day because of the exfoliants but my skin got used to it and now it feels very gentle. The biggest game changer for me has been how much less pilling I have from sunscreen and makeup. Before, I was struggling immensely with that problem but found that the exfoliants in the cleanser have made my skin much smoother before makeup application. If you have dry skin areas like me though, I would highly recommend using a thicker moisturizer or more layers of your moisturer after using the cleanser because it can be drying. Overall, I think my before and after pictures speak for themselves and I'm definitely going to be using this until I finish the bottle!  Also the papaya scent is insanely good and I get so excited to use it every morning and night :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive used this face wash a handful of times so far and i can honestly say that i love it! I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin and it works so well with it. I can never, ever use anything with a scent(even slightly) and The smell is so light. And the ingredients they use are natural and makes my skin so nice and soft i have mostly oily skin but patches of dry (and sometimes still have acne) and being in my mid 30's im starting to get dryer skin under my eyes and it does wonders for it. It seems to be balancing out the oil and dry. Everyone has different skin but i know for us with scary sensitive skin itu2019s sometimes a bunmer to find things that dont break us out. Also, i think i must have read it wrong bc i thought they said it was a very light exfoliating wash as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review from Bzzagent. This is my new favorite cleaner. One pump goes a long way, it lathers up nicely and is easy to remove. The smell is fresh and pleasant. I have extremely dry skin and this does not strip my skin or leave it feeling dry, and I can see a difference in the brightness of my skin. I really enjoy the gentle exfoliating properties, and have noticed less tiny bumps while using it. This has definitely become a staple in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great at exfoliating. The texture is pleasant and the smell was nice. It lathered up well and my skin felt cleansed with no makeup residue after using. The cleanser had a glass bottle and packaging was sturdy. I have sensitive combo skin and use a prescription retinol. I think I would only use this once a day and switch out with a gentle cleanser other times especially if my skin was feeling drier.

reviews.review_text: I have couple days using this cleaner, and it is the real deal. my pores feel so clean and fresh. my face feels a little dry afterwards but nothing major, infact I like it because I have combination skin. a little goes a LONG way. extremely happy to try this product!! a new brand fan!

reviews.review_text: The Youth to the People cleanser is a magnificent cleanser. It is gentle on me sensitive skin. It does not leave my skin dry. For the price it  is worth to splurge. It smell really good. 10/10 would recommend

reviews.review_text: Exfoliating without being the texture of a sugar scrub Great scent and a little goes a long way Super pretty packaging too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: [I received a complimentary product in exchange for an honest review] The new vitamin c and papaya exfoliating wash is a high later cleanser packed with a ton of actives: AHAs in the form of lactic acid and glycolic acid, vitamin C, niacinamide, and even salicylic acid. It should be a nightmare for sensitive skin, and yet, I was pleasantly surprised to find it non-irritating for me, with some caveats.  No way am I washing my face with this twice a day, especially when I'm using tretinoin and other actives at night. I'm using it in my place of my normal salicylic morning cleanser three days a week. I am also using a ton of sunscreen.   I think this could be a good workhorse product, but there needs to be a lot of label reading and understanding of what your skin can tolerate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser. It foams up so nicely and has a creamy texture. It feels like it cleans the skin really well. It has a light fruity smell to it but itu2019s nothing overpowering. Overall I truly love this cleanser and it has easily moved up into my top 3 favorites. Pump makes it easy to use and I love that the bottle is glass, makes it look classy and sturdy.

reviews.review_text: Let me start out by saying I am a real person with real making issues. Combo oily acne prone, cystic at that. I would absolutely buy this against it cleanses without stripping my skin, smells amazing and makes my skin glowy,
